snippet.title: Cube Life: Island Survival - official trailer [ PS4, XB1 ]
snippet.description:
Explore, build, and craft in a block-building, survival gme with Super-Duper realistic graphics for Playstation 4 and Microsoft Xbox One.

Release date january 2021

In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and survive as night falls on the island. 


In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. There is no limit to your imagination.



Features:
Block building open-world
Super-Duper Realistic Graphics
Creative Mode
Survival Mode
Skin Editor
Day/Night cycles
Tons of items and tools to discover
Crafting
Ragdoll physics
Weather changes
Tameable Pets
Many Dangers and Bosses
Stealth Attacks and Traps
And much more!


Please follow us at:
http://twitter.com/cypronia
http://www.facebook.com/cypronia
https://www.instagram.com/cypronia1/

www.cypronia.com
